resources.string: Unable to download the list of available shows. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
A much longer placeholder text string
Auto - While on Wifi, stream audio at a high quality bitrate. When on a cellular connection, stream at a lower bitrate.

WREK is the entirely student managed, operated and engineered radio station at Georgia Tech in Atlanta.

WREK broadcasts 24/7 from the Georgia Student Center on 91.1 FM with 100,000 watts throughout Atlanta in addition to streaming online with a 14-day archive.

WREK has been broadcasting since March 25th, 1968. Since then, names, faces, and clothing fashions may have changed, but the station-wide philosophy of providing diverse, quality programming to the Atlanta area and the world at large has remained unwavering.

In 1994, WREK became one of the first radio stations to stream its air signal over the Internet.
The primary content of this application including streamed audio, station emblems, logos, and show descriptions are copyright WREK Atlanta and the Georgia Institute of Technology.

HD Radio logo is a registered trademarks of iBiquity Digital Corporation. iBiquity is making these logos and materials available to licensed broadcasters for the sole purpose of promoting licensed HD Radio stations or technology.
